tool_description: Validates product data against schema requirements and business rules, identifying missing fields, format issues, and data quality problems.

product_data.description: Product data entries in JSON string format

validation_schema.description: Schema definition for validation (JSON schema format)

strict_mode.description: Whether to apply strict validation rules

error_messages: Invalid product data format: Product data must be valid JSON strings.
Schema parsing error: Provide a valid JSON schema for validation.
Empty product data: At least one product entry is required.
Data size limit exceeded: Maximum 1000 product entries per validation batch.
usage: Provide product_data array and validation_schema. Set strict_mode to true for rigorous validation. Returns validation results and cleaned data.

valid_products.description: Number of products that passed validation

invalid_products.description: Number of products that failed validation

error_details.description: Detailed error messages for failed validations

cleaned_data.description: Validated and cleaned product data entries
